title: Sitemap

source.title: Source
source.description: The source resource path to get records from. These records should at least contain a path property.

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: The origin to prepend to paths found in the source.

destination.title: Path
destination.description: The destination resource path to store sitemap to.

lastmod.title: Lastmod
lastmod.description: The format to use for last modification of a location. If not present, no last modification is added.

languages.title: Sitemap Languages
languages.description: The languages to add to the sitemap
